reviewText: This is one of the best movies ever made after seeing it like 20 time is still make me laugh.
Good fun, enough facial and body expression so its funny, even if your French is weak. Too bad English subtitles aren't available these days.
It is funny, but not earthshaking!
What a wonderful comedy of film, appropriate for all ages, pure, good fun, none of the today stupidity or grossness ! I love it, relaxing good laughs:)

I saw these movies as a kid and was amazed to find them avaialble in NTSC format now. Fully remastered in excellent quality. These are not video dupes but look like they mastered from the original 45mm film.
Classic french comedy. Hilarious
